00015   class LoopShellShape: public Shape {

00018     typedef Eigen::Matrix<double,12,Dynamic> SubdivisionMatrix;
00019     typedef vector<int> CornerValences; //Valences of nodes at three corners
00020 
00022     LoopShellShape(int nodes, CornerValences & V, const VectorXd & Point) {
00023       _nodes = nodes;
00024       _coords = Point;
00025       _Valences = V;
00026       _N.resize(nodes, 0.0); //12 shape functions
00027       _DN.resize(nodes, Vector2d::Zero()); //partial derivatives in 'v' and 'w' directions
00028       _DDN.resize(nodes, Matrix2d::Zero()); //partial deriatives in ['vv', 'vw'; 'wv' 'ww'] directions
00029       update(Point);
00030     }

00037     uint getShapeFunctionNum() {return _nodes; };
00038 
00040     Real getN(const uint a) {
00041       return _N[a];
00042     };

00045     Real getDN(const uint a, const uint i) {
00046       return _DN[a](i);
00047     };
00048    
00051     Real getDDN(const uint a, const uint i, const uint j) {
00052       return _DDN[a](i,j);
00053     };
00054     
00055     bool checkConsistency2(Vector2d Point, const Real eps, const Real tol)
00056   {
00057     // Test dimension (1D, 2D, 3D)
00058     const uint dim = Point.size();
00059     
00060     const uint NumF = this->getShapeFunctionNum();
00061     vector<Vector2d > DN(NumF, Vector2d::Zero());
00062     vector<Matrix2d > DDNnumerical(NumF, Matrix2d::Zero());
00063    
00064     Real error = 0.0, norm = 0.0;
00065 
00066     // Compute numerical derivatives
00067     for(uint j = 0; j < 2; j++){
00068       for(uint i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00069     {
00070       Point(i) += eps;
00071       this->update(Point);
00072       for(uint a = 0; a < NumF; a++) 
00073         DDNnumerical[a](i,j) = this->getDN(a,j);
00074       
00075       Point(i) -= 2*eps;
00076       this->update(Point);
00077       for(uint a = 0; a < NumF; a++)
00078         DDNnumerical[a](i,j)-= this->getDN(a,j);
00079       
00080       Point(i) += eps;
00081       for(uint a = 0; a < NumF; a++) 
00082         DDNnumerical[a](i,j) /= (2.0*eps);    
00083     }
00084     }
00085     // Compute error norm
00086     for(uint a = 0; a < NumF; a++) {
00087       for(uint j = 0; j < dim; j++) {
00088     for(uint i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00089       error += pow(this->getDDN(a,i,j) - DDNnumerical[a](i,j), 2);
00090       norm  += pow(this->getDDN(a,i,j), 2);
00091     }
00092       }
00093     }
00094     norm = sqrt(norm);
00095     error = sqrt(error);
00096     
00097     cout << "Error = " << error << " Norm = " << norm << endl;
00098     if ( abs(error) < norm * tol) {
00099       cout << "Shape consistency check passed" << endl;
00100       return true;
00101     }
00102     else {
00103       cout << "Shape consistency check failed" << endl
00104        << setw(10) << "n"
00105        << setw(24) << "analytical"
00106        << setw(24) << "numerical" << endl;   
00107       for(uint a = 0; a < NumF; a++)
00108     for(uint i = 0; i < dim; i++){
00109       for(uint j = 0; j < dim; j++){
00110         cout << setw(10) << a << setw(24) << this->getDDN(a,i,j)
00111          << setw(24) << DDNnumerical[a](i,j) ;
00112       }
00113       cout << endl;
00114     }
00115     }
00116 
00117     return false;
00118   } // consistency check
00119
